attributes.title: Varly
attributes.7: yes==In the books==In the ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' novels, Varly is a guardsman sworn to House Stark. He is killed by Janos Slynt during the Massacre in the Red Keep as his fellow guards are massacred by the Gold Cloaks==See also==*AWOIAF==References==ReflistStark navboxCategory:CharactersCategory:Minor CharactersCategory:Season 1 CharactersCategory:Status: DeadCategory:House StarkCategory:SmallfolkCategory:Characters from the North
attributes.place: Winterfell'''Varly''' is a minor character in the Season 1

sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Varly is a guardsman sworn to House Stark. He is killed by [[Janos Slynt]] during the [[Massacre in the Red Keep]] as his fellow guards are massacred by the Gold Cloaks
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 1]]===
Varly accompanies [[Eddard Stark]] south when he becomes the [[Hand of the King]]. He warns the [[Royal Steward]] to stay back when he surprises them in the corridor. He accompanies Eddard to the throne room to confront [[Joffrey Baratheon]]. He is killed by men of the [[City Watch]] when [[Massacre in the Red Keep|they betray Eddard]].<ref>"[[You Win or You Die]]"</ref>
